statements: UPDATE science_fair SET advisor_name = 'Professor Smith' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE science_fair SET project_title = 'Exploring the Universe', project_description = 'An in-depth study of galaxies and stars' WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE science_fair SET project_description = 'Research findings on quantum physics' WHERE student_id = 123;
UPDATE science_fair SET advisor_name = 'Dr. Smith', project_title = 'Advanced Robotics', presentation_date = '2022-06-15 10:00:00' WHERE student_id = 456;
UPDATE projects SET project_title='New Project Title', project_date='2023-09-15' WHERE project_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE judges SET judge_name='John Doe', judge_department='Engineering' WHERE judge_id='234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE projects SET project_title='Updated Title', project_description='Updated Description' WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE judges SET judge_experience=8, judge_department='Updated Department' WHERE judge_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE projects SET title='New Project Title', advisor_id=2 WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE students SET grade_level=12, school='New School Name' WHERE student_id=3;
UPDATE projects SET title='New Project Title', abstract='Updated Project abstract.' WHERE project_id=1000;
UPDATE students SET grade_level=12, school='New School Name' WHERE student_id=500;
UPDATE project SET project_grade = 85 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE score SET score_value = 9.5 WHERE judge_id = 3 AND project_id = 2;
UPDATE project SET project_grade = 90, student_name = 'Alice' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE judge SET judge_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE judge_id = 3;
UPDATE projects SET title = 'New Project Title' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET grade_level = grade_level + 1 WHERE student_id = 5;
UPDATE projects SET title = 'New Project Title', advisor_id = 2 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET full_name = 'John Doe', grade_level = 12 WHERE student_id = 3;
